text:
RT @TeamPelosi Americans know why the #TrumpBudget — that Republicans support — slashes $2,300,000,000,000 from Medicare, Medicaid and Social Security. 👇

They're trying to pay for the GOP Tax Scam which favors big corporations and wealthy people.

Slavery is a stain on America & we need to address it head on. I believe it’s time to start a national, full-blown conversation about reparations. I support the bill in the House to support a congressional panel of experts so that our nation can do what’s right & begin to heal.

My Anti-Corruption Act would ban Americans from getting paid to lobby for foreign governments – period. If foreign governments want to express their views, they should use their diplomats. https://www.politico.com/story/2019/03/15/trump-lobby-firms-foreign-governments-1222197

I urge President Trump to end all sanctions waivers for foreign purchasers of Iranian oil given the significant surplus capacity in international oil markets. It's time to maximize pressure against Tehran’s terror-sponsoring & nuke-seeking regime. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-03-15/oil-market-can-withstand-zero-iranian-exports-u-s-officials

Please pray today for our fellow Americans in Iowa, Nebraska & South Dakota impacted by severe flooding this weekend. 

And those farther south in Missouri River basin please heed the warnings  issued by ⁦@NWS⁩ of further flooding that is expected. https://www.wsj.com/articles/record-floods-wreak-havoc-on-midwestern-states-11552861040

My thoughts are with the victims and families affected by flooding across the Midwest. Grateful for the brave first responders who are helping people get to safety. https://www.cnn.com/2019/03/17/us/nebraska-flooding-sunday-wxc/index.html

Of the 40 million family caregivers in the U.S., one in four are millennials. Guaranteed paid family leave would support families, protect workers, assist those taking on the role as caregiver, and give financial security for future generations.
https://www.npr.org/2019/03/16/702698968/as-parents-and-grandparents-age-more-and-more-millennials-are-family-caregivers

Saudi Arabia has brutally crushed dissent—kidnapping, detaining, torturing its own citizens—even murdering Jamal Khashoggi, a Washington Post journalist who dared to criticize the regime. The Trump administration has done nothing to hold them accountable. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/03/17/world/middleeast/khashoggi-crown-prince-saudi.html

Why do you notice the splinter in your brother’s eye, but do not perceive the wooden beam in your own?
 Luke 6:41

Tonight’s @CNN town hall is a powerful opportunity for our grassroots movement to talk about the big ideas we’re fighting for. - A wealth tax
- Universal child care
- Break up big tech 
- Housing https://twitter.com/mj_lee/status/1107680251306348544

This is a campaign by the people and for the people. We’re in this fight together to bring about the big, structural change our country needs. https://twitter.com/CNN/status/1106895670861008898 QT @CNN As one of a host of Democrats vying for the 2020 Presidential nomination, Sen. Elizabeth Warren has big political plans. For now though, she's starting small, with a grassroots strategy rooted in surprise cell phone calls and limitless selfies. https://trib.al/0df9pby http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1106749549387882497/img/6TNq2M9m1x5v5Gp5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1106749549387882497/vid/320x180/MbroRdVk6MTDmGx6.mp4?tag=11

What I mean by democratic socialism is that I want a vibrant democracy. Trump is actively involved in voter suppression and trying to keep people of color or low-income people from voting. I want to make it easier to vote.

This is a perfect example of why I want to #BreakUpBigTech. You can be the umpire or you can own a team—but you can’t do both at the same time. https://www.wsj.com/articles/amazon-tests-pop-up-feature-touting-its-lower-priced-products-11552655614

Voter disenfranchisement is real. I believe we need a constitutional amendment that protects the right to vote for every American citizen. We need to repeal every one of the voter suppression laws out there. And we need to make sure every vote gets counted. #WarrenTownHall

Passing the EQUALITY Act would send a clear message that discrimination against transgender people won’t be tolerated. No one should be fired or dehumanized by their employer simply for their gender identity or expression.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1Ewar2WkAEtslK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1103714532587945985/vid/320x320/36hs_1BA5iDUVNUC.mp4?tag=9

Maternal mortality is a real problem in our country—and it disproportionately impacts Black and Brown women. We need more funding for the NIH and we need to fight for our mamas and babies. #WarrenTownHall

Proud to see my hometown of Bowling Green, Kentucky, recognized!
https://www.lanereport.com/110609/2019/02/money-magazine-the-best-place-to-live-in-kentucky/

Washington is working great for the rich and the powerful—but it’s not working great for people living paycheck to paycheck. I want a Washington that works for the rest of America. That’s why I’m in this fight. #WarrenTownHall

When “centrists” care more about the GOP base than the Dem base, bigotry gets legitimized.

This is *the* playbook. GOP does it w/ virtually every Dem figure who isn’t a white male: otherize, demonize + splinter.

It’s vital that we adapt & dismantle this approach, not cow to it. https://twitter.com/davidoatkins/status/1107721283322540032 QT @DavidOAtkins It's interesting to see centrists suddenly downplay or ignore the effects of racism, sexism and Fox News targeting when discussing @AOC's overall approval ratings.

After my daddy’s heart attack, my family was this close to losing our house. My mother got a minimum wage job at Sears that saved our house & family. Today a minimum wage job can’t even support a mama and a baby. I’m in this fight because I believe that’s wrong. #WarrenTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1107832150940880896/img/Gl7hGE25MW-3fLem.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1107832150940880896/vid/320x180/eQGeGr813ZHRMaGP.mp4?tag=11
In the wealthiest country in the history of the world we can provide a decent standard of living for all of our people. That's not utopian dreaming. That is a reality.

"I was the first & only potential GOP candidate to state there will be no cuts to Social Security, Medicare & Medicaid."

-Cuts Social Security by $25 billion
-Cuts Medicare by $845 billion
-Cuts Medicaid by nearly $1.5 trillion

I’m not taking PAC money or meeting with rich donors behind closed doors. I'm working to build this campaign face to face, person to person, neighborhood to neighborhood. RT @Lollardfish Elizabeth Warren and her team:

1) Recognize problems
2) Develop nuanced ways that the government can help address those problems.
3) Communicate them effectively without a media filter.

It's unprecedented I think. https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1106920618145079296 QT @ewarren Housing is one of the biggest purchases most Americans will make in their lifetimes. My new Housing plan would address some of the most pressing issues that have kept homeownership out of reach for too many families. Here’s how we’re going to do it: https://medium.com/@teamwarren/my-housing-plan-for-america-20038e19dc26

We need a president who will stand up to the gun lobby. We had an assault weapons ban once, and we should have it again. These weapons of war do not belong on our streets, in our schools, or at our houses of worship. This is a fight I will take on as president.

The border wall isn’t about security, or making America safer. It’s a monument to hate and division, and I won’t support it. We are a better country than that. #WarrenTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1107818616068730880/img/3HmgnnK3CYQIrxES.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1107818616068730880/vid/320x180/2fL298xfsctxPWpe.mp4?tag=11

Under the Post-9/11 GI Bill, members of our military can transfer unused education benefits to a spouse or child, but this doesn’t apply across the board to foster children and legal wards. My colleagues and I introduced a common-sense fix to make those benefits universal.

Trump’s ban on transgender Americans serving in the military is insulting and deeply un-American. The next president should immediately end this ridiculous policy—if elected, I plan to do so. https://www.nbcnews.com/feature/nbc-out/cory-booker-pledges-undo-trump-s-un-american-trans-military-n984341

White supremacists committed the largest # of extremist killings in 2017.

What the President is saying here: “if you engage in violent acts of white supremacy, I will look the other way.”

Understand that this is deliberate. This is why we can’t afford to sit on the sidelines. https://twitter.com/splcenter/status/1106661411726524417 QT @splcenter Reporter: "Do you see white nationalism as a rising threat around the world?"

Trump: "I don't really."

We saw a nearly 50% increase in white nationalist hate groups between 2017 and 2018. https://www.splcenter.org/hate-map http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1106661383188430850/pu/img/u6hBRgomL6TKw7ZP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1106661383188430850/pu/vid/320x180/qAdOkBWuV2x9oQTu.mp4?tag=8

Budgets reflect our values. This administration proposed a budget that cuts more than a trillion $ from Social Security, Medicare & Medicaid while extending tax cuts for the top 1%. This is backwards. We must do more for working families, not gut the programs they’re counting on.

It’s not enough to simply decriminalize marijuana—we must repair the damage done to those communities that have been most harmed by the failed War on Drugs, and we must expunge the records of those who have served their time. https://www.newsweek.com/cory-booker-asks-government-legalize-marijuana-again-time-presidential-1356074

The time has come to end an antiquated practice that continues to frustrate a growing majority of the public: the biannual practice of changing our clocks forward and back. 

It makes no sense and has no justification.   https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/trump-is-right-daylight-saving-time-should-be-permanent/2019/03/15/e983315c-466a-11e9-8aab-95b8d80a1e4f_story.html

World-renowned ballerina Maria Tallchief was repeatedly told she should change her name so dance companies wouldn’t discriminate against her because of her Native American ancestry. She refused, and would go on to become America's first major prima ballerina. #WomensHistoryMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1-i_KzWoAEKb29.jpg

Right now almost half of Americas don’t have enough cash to cover a $400 emergency expense. That’s just frightening. 

It’s why I introduced the LIFT Act to give middle class families a tax credit of up to $500 a month.

"I don't care when 45 calls him 'Crazy Bernie'... Bernie went to Disneyland and literally said that he did not think that Mickey Mouse and Goofy approved of Disney not paying their workers a living wage. You gotta be a little crazy to do that." -@shaunking http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1107822754982699008/img/l4rnNLthIYHA8Ktt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1107822754982699008/vid/320x320/19KWnnOOlCkjG_1L.mp4?tag=11

Health care is a basic human right, and we fight for basic human rights. That means we need to protect the Affordable Care Act, bring down the cost of prescription drugs, hold insurance companies accountable, and fight for 100% coverage with #MedicareForAll. #WarrenTownHall

RT @PostOpinions "It’s time for Congress to finally do away with the hour shifting by making daylight saving time permanent," Florida Sen. @marcorubio and Florida Rep. @VernBuchanan write https://trib.al/n7NNGKy

Democrat, Republican, or Independent, Americans know a scam when they see one. And they can see that Washington is working great for the rich and the powerful. The American people are ready to fight for a country that works for everybody else. #WarrenTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1107816683639660544/img/Yv4oaiWgJZDS8NtZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1107816683639660544/vid/320x180/eBas6g9polo_tQsv.mp4?tag=11

As I’ve traveled the country, I’ve met with folks working two or three jobs just to get by. Their wages aren’t keeping up with the cost of living, gas, rent, and utilities. That’s why I proposed two bills to give middle-class and working families a lift up.

I won’t back down from speaking the truth about major corporations that threaten our environment. I held Big Oil and polluters accountable after the 2015 oil spill and took on gas price fixing in California — I’ll continue that tough fight to preserve our planet and economy.

Our nation's leaders should have acted to end gun violence after Sandy Hook. 
After Charleston. 
After San Bernardino. 
After Pulse. 
After Sutherland Springs. 
After Las Vegas.
After the Tree of Life Synagogue. 
After Parkland. 
After Thousand Oaks. 

How many more?

#Sayfie

Having a decent and safe place to live should be a basic human right. My new housing bill would build or rehabilitate 3 million units, lower rents across the country by 10%, create over a million new jobs, and tackle our government’s history of racist redlining. #WarrenTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1_B9e-WsAAGpZM.jpg

We can’t gloss over it, or quietly consider that the “shrewd” thing to do is nominate someone who won’t be subject to bigoted attacks.

Morally, we can’t give a pass to this dangerous tactic.

But even politically, the Dem base is all the people you demoralize by not standing up.

Something we've got to keep in mind: a Green New Deal has to be built upon equity & justice. We have an opportunity right now to address climate change while also lifting up communities of color, the poor, and those who have been too often left behind. Let's get it done.
We need to make it easier to join a union and for workers to make their voices heard. Unions built America’s middle class, and unions will rebuild America’s middle class. #WarrenTownHall

RT @kylegriffin1 The House Judiciary Committee is planning on hosting a hearing in the coming weeks addressing the rise of white nationalism in the U.S. and the hate crime and hate speech surrounding the movement, two sources with direct knowledge tell The Daily Beast. https://www.thedailybeast.com/house-judiciary-committee-planning-hearing-on-the-rise-of-white-nationalism?via=twitter_page

We’re going to do this together. #WarrenTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1-pcojX4AMgBN4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1-pdP5WwAAIPF2.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1-pdpaWoAEd5nX.jpg

This is different than being moderate on policy. I may disagree w/ approach (keeping the ACA as-is w/small tweaks, etc), but at least that’s a policy convo.

But to make decisions based on the political efficacy of a bigoted argument gives that bigotry power, & that’s a problem.

I want to say something very controversial: I believe in science. Climate change is real, it is man-made, and we are running out of time. We need all hands on deck to pass a #GreenNewDeal and invest in sustainable infrastructure. #WarrenTownHall
@soledadobrien My deepest condolences, Soledad. Thank you for sharing her important story with us.

There is a sacred responsibility on our leadership to understand that we can’t use the military to solve non-military problems. We need to be using all the diplomatic and economic tools in the toolbox. No more endless wars. #WarrenTownHall

Student loan debt is now roughly $1.5 trillion - that's more than credit card debt. This hurts students and harms our economy. Congress should pass the Debt-Free College Act immediately. https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/meet-the-press/real-college-crisis-student-debt-drags-down-economy-n984131?cid=sm_npd_ms_tw_ma

My favorite Bible verse includes two lessons that guide me every day: There is value in every single human being, and every one of us is called to action. #WarrenTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1107836740751015936/img/66MQ68Dqb1Ao09yi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1107836740751015936/vid/320x180/KKkrXDhJR99tnxLI.mp4?tag=11

We need to have policies on immigration that are consistent with our values. We are a country built on our differences. That is our strength not our weakness. When people come to our country fearing for their lives, then we have a moral responsibility to act. #WarrenTownHall

Our fight is about making big, structural change—and it starts with you. Chip in whatever you can and let’s grow this grassroots movement. If we dream big and fight hard, there’s nothing we can’t do. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ew-mar19social?refcode=20190318tw

On average, we lose seven children and teens every day to gun violence. But we do nothing. Why? Because the federal government is being held hostage by the NRA. Laws should reflect our morals—we need #GunReformNow. #WarrenTownHall

Here’s how we can level the playing field for working people and give everyone a fighting chance: an #UltraMillionaireTax on the richest of the rich.
